column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The ramen:  Ive had the tonkotsu black at other locations but dont remember how it compared.  The broth was good
column2: however my bowl didnt come with enough broth
column3: maybe it was sitting too long and it evaporated?  Noodles were decent
column4: I would probably like to opt for the thicker noodle to see
column5: The plus is that you can pay for more broth/noodle as well as other toppings.  The egg was decent in consistency
column6: but lacked in overall flavor.  The condiments were decent
column7: and you can add more with more $$.
